lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Susan Segal, senior vice president of Manufacturers Hanover, said the swaps not only reduce Mexico's debt burden but help to recapitalize local industries that may have been squeezed out of the local capital markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But some bankers, who declined to be identified, said the halt also suited Mexico as it would keep up pressure on the banks during the final campaign to persuade all 400 creditors worldwide to participate in the loan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Adolfo Hegewisch, Mexico's Undersecretary for Commerce, confirmed that the swap program had been halted, but he told a Euromoney conference on debt-equity swaps that Mexico had been forced to act because it had been inundated with applications.
